item.title: Fire erupts on 21st floor of new Commercial Bay highrise
item.description:
More than a dozen fire crews raced to the newly opened Commercial Bay shopping centre in Auckland's CBD tonight after a fire broke out on the 21st floor.
A fire in a 2m by 1m skip on the multi-million ...

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202027/IMG_0219_70x71.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Au pairs should be granted entry into the country because help free-up New Zealand's essential workers keep working, au pair agencies say. Photo / Supplied
